### Version history

This page provides information about older or alternative versions of  indicative distribution map for this ecosystem functional group [**{{< meta params.efgname >}}**](/efg-info/M1_1.qmd).
Check the current maps [here](/map-info/M1_1_valid.qmd).

- Web navigation (**code: M1.1.WM.nwx**, version v1.0) in preparation 

### Datasets

Datasets considered for previous versions of the indicative map

- **ModSeagrass2018** (Jayathilake and Costello 2018).

::: {.cell}
::: {.cell-output-display}


|dataset         |url                                                      |
|:---------------|:--------------------------------------------------------|
|ModSeagrass2018 |<https://data.unep-wcmc.org/datasets/46>{target='links'} |


:::
:::

### Available files

You can download geospatial data for older versions of these maps from the following sources:



Note that you need to login to some services like [mapbox](https://www.mapbox.com){target="links"} or [earthengine](https://earthengine.google.com){target="links"}, and in some cases you also need to request access to the files.

###  License information

Indicative maps have been released with a ![](https://zenodo.org/static/icons/licenses/cc-by-icon.svg){height=20} Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International license. 

But see details of dataset licenses below:

::: {.cell}
::: {.cell-output-display}

|:---------------|:--------------------------------------------|
|ModSeagrass2018 |https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/ |


:::
:::

## References

References used in these versions of the maps.

- Jayathilake D.R.M., Costello M.J. (2018) *A modelled global distribution of the seagrass biome* **Biological Conservation**  [DOI:10.1016/j.biocon.2018.07.009](http:dx.doi.org/10.1016/j.biocon.2018.07.009)
